           <path d="M73.6628 53.4328C73.6628 52.6162 73.6628 52.4995 72.8931 52.3828L72.3434 52.2662C72.2335 52.2078 72.2335 51.9162 72.3434 51.7995C73.0031 51.8578 73.7177 51.8578 74.2125 51.8578C74.6523 51.8578 75.202 51.8578 75.5868 51.7995C75.6968 51.8578 75.7517 52.1495 75.6418 52.2662L75.3669 52.3245C74.9271 52.4412 74.8722 52.5578 74.8722 53.3162V53.7828C74.8722 54.1912 74.9271 54.4828 75.147 54.5995C75.202 54.6578 75.202 54.8328 75.147 54.8328C74.9821 54.8328 74.5973 54.9495 74.1575 55.0078C73.7177 55.0662 73.113 55.2412 72.5083 55.2412C71.0241 55.2412 69.8147 54.8912 68.9351 53.9578C68.2205 53.1995 67.8906 52.2078 67.8906 51.2745C67.8906 50.2828 68.2205 49.2911 68.9351 48.5328C69.7047 47.7161 70.8042 47.1328 72.5633 47.1328C73.4978 47.1328 74.2675 47.3661 74.7622 47.4828C74.7622 47.8328 74.8172 48.5328 74.9271 49.4662C74.8722 49.6412 74.5973 49.6412 74.4874 49.4662C74.0476 48.0661 73.3329 47.5995 72.1235 47.5995C70.3644 47.5995 69.3199 48.9995 69.3199 51.0412C69.3199 53.1995 70.5843 54.6578 72.5633 54.6578C73.4429 54.6578 73.5528 54.4828 73.5528 53.7828V53.4328H73.6628Z" fill="#002677">
           </path>
           <path d="M86.4717 50.1086C86.4717 48.3586 86.3617 47.8919 85.757 47.8336L85.2073 47.7753C85.0974 47.6586 85.0974 47.4253 85.2623 47.3086C85.867 47.3669 86.2518 47.3669 86.7466 47.3669C87.2413 47.3669 87.5711 47.3669 88.1209 47.3086C88.2308 47.3669 88.2308 47.6586 88.1209 47.7753L87.6261 47.8336C87.1863 47.8919 87.0764 48.3586 87.0764 50.1086V53.0253C87.0764 53.3753 87.0764 54.7753 87.1314 55.0669C87.0764 55.1836 86.9115 55.2419 86.8015 55.2419C86.6366 55.0086 86.3068 54.6003 85.2623 53.4336L82.7335 50.5753C82.1288 49.8753 81.689 49.4086 81.4691 49.2336C81.4142 49.2336 81.4142 49.4086 81.4142 49.9919V52.3253C81.4142 54.0753 81.5241 54.5419 82.1288 54.6003L82.6786 54.6586C82.7885 54.7753 82.7885 55.0086 82.6236 55.1253C82.0189 55.0669 81.6341 55.0669 81.1393 55.0669C80.6446 55.0669 80.3697 55.0669 79.765 55.1253C79.655 55.0669 79.655 54.7753 79.765 54.6586L80.2597 54.6003C80.6995 54.5419 80.8095 54.0753 80.8095 52.3253V49.1753C80.8095 48.5919 80.8095 48.3586 80.4796 48.0669C80.3697 47.9503 80.0398 47.8336 79.8749 47.8336L79.6001 47.7753C79.4901 47.6586 79.4901 47.4253 79.655 47.3086C80.2597 47.3669 80.6995 47.3669 81.0843 47.3669C81.3042 47.3669 81.5241 47.3669 81.744 47.3086C82.0738 47.9503 82.6786 48.7086 83.3382 49.4669L84.8775 51.1586C85.2623 51.5669 86.1968 52.6753 86.3618 52.7919C86.4717 52.7336 86.4717 52.5003 86.4717 52.0919V50.1086Z" fill="#002677">
           </path>
          </svg>
         </span>
        </a>
        <button aria-controls="main-menu" aria-expanded="false" class="block lg:hidden" data-menu-close="">
         <span class="sr-only">
          Close
         </span>
         <span class="icon rect-14 block">
          <svg aria-hidden="true" fill="none" viewbox="0 0 14 14" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
           <path d="M8.46 7L14 12.54V14H12.54L7 8.46L1.46 14H0V12.54L5.54 7L0 1.46V0H1.46L7 5.54L12.54 0H14V1.46L8.46 7Z">
           </path>
          </svg>
         </span>
        </button>
       </div>

    <header>
     <div class="wrapper flex flex-wrap">
      <div class="w-full md:w-1/2">
       <p class="sr-only">
        Video:
       </p>
       <div class="bg-black relative min-h-full" data-module="video">

         <button aria-controls="hero-video" class="text-current shadow-xl rounded-full focus-hover:text-yellow-500" data-control="">
          <span data-pause="">
           <span class="icon rect-24">
            <svg aria-hidden="true" fill="none" viewbox="0 0 14 15" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">

             </path>
            </svg>
           </span>
           <span class="sr-only">
            Play
           </span>
          </span>
         </button>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
      <div class="p-32 relative w-full z-1 md:flex md:flex-col md:justify-center md:w-1/2">
       <p class="leading-normal max-w-540 mb-32 text-18 lg-d:hidden">
        The Human Rights Campaign envisions a world where every member of the LGBTQ family has the freedom to live their truth without fear, and with equality under the law. We empower our 3 million members and supporters to mobilize against attacks on the most marginalized people in our community.
       </p>
       <h1 class="text-40 leading-tight font-bold text-center tracking-default xs:text-48 md:-ml-96 md:-mr-32 md:text-40 lg:-ml-64 lg:text-48 xl:m-0 xl:text-80 xl:text-left xxl:text-100">
        Equality for
        <span class="sr-only">
         All,
        </span>
        <span class="icon block my-16 md-d:-ml-48 md-d:-mr-32 xl:-ml-204 xl:-mr-32 xl:w-878">
         <svg aria-hidden="true" viewbox="0 0 355 137" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
          <path d="M0 137H39.7087L46.3904 116.881H92.5899L99.2717 137H141.653L91.0626 0H50.3995L0 137ZM64.3357 62.4643C66.6265 55.758 69.4902 44.8364 69.4902 44.8364H69.872C69.872 44.8364 72.9265 55.758 75.0265 62.4643L83.6173 89.2895H55.363L64.3357 62.4643Z" fill="#FFE614">
          </path>
          <path d="M152.988 137H251.305V102.702H192.888V0H152.988V137Z" fill="#FFE614">
          </path>
          <path d="M265.683 137H364V102.702H305.582V0H265.683V137Z" fill="#FFE614">
          </path>
         </svg>
        </span>
        not for some
       </h1>
      </div>
      <div class="pb-32 text-center w-full md:pt-32 lg:hidden">
       <div class="wrapper -padded -xs">
        <p class="leading-snug">
         The Human Rights Campaign envisions a world where every member of the LGBTQ family has the freedom to live their truth without fear, and with equality under the law. We empower our 3 million members and supporters to mobilize against attacks on the most marginalized people in our community.
        </p>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </header>
    <section class="section bg-blue-400 homepage-what-we-do pb-112 text-center text-white lg:pt-204">
     <div class="wrapper -sm -padded">
      <h2 class="heading-48 mb-20">
       Breaking down barriers that divide us
      </h2>
      <p class="mb-64 text-18">
       We are more powerful together than apart, and we’ve never been more energized or more focused. Our work centers on three pillars of action to end discrimination and fight for change at every level — and for every single one of us.
      </p>
     </div>
     <div class="wrapper -lg -padded">
      <ul class="flex-grid items-start justify-center mx-auto max-w-800 lg:max-w-full">
       <li class="flex-grid-col w-full lg:w-1/3">
        <a class="block px-32 sm:flex sm:items-center lg:block text-current focus-hover:text-current" href="https://www.hrc.org/get-involved">
         <img alt="" class="rounded-full mb-32 sm:mb-0 sm:w-1/3 lg:mb-32 lg:w-full" src="https://hrc.imgix.net/mobilize.png?auto=format%2Ccompress&amp;crop=focalpoint&amp;fit=crop&amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;h=288&amp;ixlib=php-2.1.1&amp;w=288&amp;s=38f1d62000a5ecfb97ce99537a5adaa2" srcset="https://hrc.imgix.net/mobilize.png?auto=format%2Ccompress&amp;crop=focalpoint&amp;fit=crop&amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;h=288&amp;ixlib=php-2.1.1&amp;w=288&amp;s=38f1d62000a5ecfb97ce99537a5adaa2 288w" width="288"/>
         <div class="sm:ml-32 sm:text-left lg:ml-0 lg:text-center">
          <p class="heading-24 mb-8">
           Mobilizing Equality Voters nationwide
          </p>
          <p class="type-italic underline">
           Mobilize
          </p>
         </div>
        </a>
       </li>
       <li class="flex-grid-col w-full lg:w-1/3 sm-d:pt-24">
        <a class="block px-32 sm:flex sm:items-center lg:block text-current focus-hover:text-current" href="https://www.hrc.org/resources">
         <img alt="" class="rounded-full mb-32 sm:mb-0 sm:w-1/3 lg:mb-32 lg:w-full" src="https://hrc.imgix.net/files/images/site/Educate-Homepage.png?auto=format%2Ccompress&amp;crop=focalpoint&amp;fit=crop&amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;h=288&amp;ixlib=php-2.1.1&amp;w=288&amp;s=b3b6225c7c9fd9bfb82eb36f012f1d11" srcset="https://hrc.imgix.net/files/images/site/Educate-Homepage.png?auto=format%2Ccompress&amp;crop=focalpoint&amp;fit=crop&amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;h=288&amp;ixlib=php-2.1.1&amp;w=288&amp;s=b3b6225c7c9fd9bfb82eb36f012f1d11 288w" width="288"/>
         <div class="sm:ml-32 sm:text-left lg:ml-0 lg:text-center">
          <p class="heading-24 mb-8">
           Educating the public &amp; the community about LGBTQ issues
          </p>
          <p class="type-italic underline">
           Educate
          </p>
         </div>
        </a>
       </li>
       <li class="flex-grid-col w-full lg:w-1/3 sm-d:pt-24">
        <a class="block px-32 sm:flex sm:items-center lg:block text-current focus-hover:text-current" href="https://www.hrc.org/our-work">
         <img alt="" class="rounded-full mb-32 sm:mb-0 sm:w-1/3 lg:mb-32 lg:w-full" src="https://hrc.imgix.net/Advocate.png?auto=format%2Ccompress&amp;crop=focalpoint&amp;fit=crop&amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;h=288&amp;ixlib=php-2.1.1&amp;w=288&amp;s=aadb6390924faa1d5646b0a2e775e1f1" srcset="https://hrc.imgix.net/Advocate.png?auto=format%2Ccompress&amp;crop=focalpoint&amp;fit=crop&amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;h=288&amp;ixlib=php-2.1.1&amp;w=288&amp;s=aadb6390924faa1d5646b0a2e775e1f1 288w" width="288"/>
         <div class="sm:ml-32 sm:text-left lg:ml-0 lg:text-center">
          <p class="heading-24 mb-8">
           Advancing pro-equality policy &amp; litigation
          </p>
          <p class="type-italic underline">
           Advocate
          </p>
         </div>
        </a>
       </li>
      </ul>
     </div>
    </section>
    <section class="section bg-white">
     <div class="wrapper -lg -padded">
      <div class="flex-grid items-center justify-between">
       <div class="flex-grid-col w-full md-d:text-center md:w-1/2 lg:w-2/5">
        <h2 class="font-bold leading-squeeze text-36 md:text-48">
         Making history is what we do
        </h2>
        <p class="leading-snug mt-16 md:leading-normal md:text-20">
         Since 1980, we’ve led the way in fighting for LGBTQ equality and inclusion.
        </p>
       </div>
       <div class="flex-grid-col w-full md:w-1/2 lg:w-2/5">
        <ul>
         <li>
          <a class="block-link text-20 md-d:py-16 md:text-24 border-t-0" href="https://www.hrc.org/our-work/stories/turnout-in-2018">
           <span>
            #TurnOut in 2018
           </span>
           <span class="icon rect-24 flex-shrink-0 ml-16 mt-2 text-theme-link-default-cyan-500">
            <svg aria-hidden="true" viewbox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
             <path d="M13.2929 6.29291C13.6834 5.90238 14.3166 5.90236 14.7071 6.29288L19.7071 11.2926C19.8946 11.4802 20 11.7345 20 11.9997C20 12.265 19.8946 12.5193 19.7071 12.7069L14.7071 17.7069C14.3166 18.0974 13.6834 18.0974 13.2929 17.7069C12.9024 17.3163 12.9024 16.6832 13.2929 16.2926L16.5858 12.9998H6C5.44772 12.9998 5 12.552 5 11.9998C5 11.4475 5.44772 10.9998 6 10.9998H16.5857L13.2929 7.70712C12.9024 7.31661 12.9024 6.68344 13.2929 6.29291Z">
             </path>
            </svg>
           </span>
          </a>
         </li>
         <li>
          <a class="block-link text-20 md-d:py-16 md:text-24" href="https://www.hrc.org/our-work/stories/the-journey-to-marriage-equality-in-the-united-states">
           <span>
            The Journey to Marriage Equality in the United States
           </span>
           <span class="icon rect-24 flex-shrink-0 ml-16 mt-2 text-theme-link-default-cyan-500">
            <svg aria-hidden="true" viewbox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
             <path d="M13.2929 6.29291C13.6834 5.90238 14.3166 5.90236 14.7071 6.29288L19.7071 11.2926C19.8946 11.4802 20 11.7345 20 11.9997C20 12.265 19.8946 12.5193 19.7071 12.7069L14.7071 17.7069C14.3166 18.0974 13.6834 18.0974 13.2929 17.7069C12.9024 17.3163 12.9024 16.6832 13.2929 16.2926L16.5858 12.9998H6C5.44772 12.9998 5 12.552 5 11.9998C5 11.4475 5.44772 10.9998 6 10.9998H16.5857L13.2929 7.70712C12.9024 7.31661 12.9024 6.68344 13.2929 6.29291Z">
             </path>
            </svg>
           </span>
          </a>
         </li>
         <li>
          <a class="block-link text-20 md-d:py-16 md:text-24" href="https://www.hrc.org/our-work/stories/repeal-of-dont-ask-dont-tell">
           <span>
            Repeal of "Don't Ask, Don't Tell"
           </span>
           <span class="icon rect-24 flex-shrink-0 ml-16 mt-2 text-theme-link-default-cyan-500">
            <svg aria-hidden="true" viewbox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
             <path d="M13.2929 6.29291C13.6834 5.90238 14.3166 5.90236 14.7071 6.29288L19.7071 11.2926C19.8946 11.4802 20 11.7345 20 11.9997C20 12.265 19.8946 12.5193 19.7071 12.7069L14.7071 17.7069C14.3166 18.0974 13.6834 18.0974 13.2929 17.7069C12.9024 17.3163 12.9024 16.6832 13.2929 16.2926L16.5858 12.9998H6C5.44772 12.9998 5 12.552 5 11.9998C5 11.4475 5.44772 10.9998 6 10.9998H16.5857L13.2929 7.70712C12.9024 7.31661 12.9024 6.68344 13.2929 6.29291Z">
             </path>
            </svg>
           </span>
          </a>
         </li>
        </ul>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </section>
    <section class="section bg-blue-100 text-center">
     <div class="wrapper -sm -padded mb-64">
      <h2 class="heading-48 mb-24">
       Equality is on the move
      </h2>
      <p class="leading-snug text-16 md:leading-normal md:text-20">
       A newly energized and passionate force of LGBTQ people and allies is calling attention to the most urgent opportunities for change — and making that change a reality.
      </p>
     </div>
     <div class="wrapper -lg -padded">
      <ul class="flex-grid justify-center">
       <li class="flex-grid-col w-full xs:w-1/2 md:w-1/3">
        <a class="block text-current" href="https://www.hrc.org/campaigns/equality-act">
         <img alt="" class="mb-32" src="https://hrc.imgix.net/files/images/blog/Equality_Act_Scanlon_1600x900.jpg?auto=format%2Ccompress&amp;crop=focalpoint&amp;fit=crop&amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;h=211.2&amp;ixlib=php-2.1.1&amp;w=352&amp;s=51314ae39c72ac8f9ef375a8e117112f" srcset="https://hrc.imgix.net/files/images/blog/Equality_Act_Scanlon_1600x900.jpg?auto=format%2Ccompress&amp;crop=focalpoint&amp;fit=crop&amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;h=211.2&amp;ixlib=php-2.1.1&amp;w=352&amp;s=51314ae39c72ac8f9ef375a8e117112f 352w" width="352"/>
         <p class="heading-24 mb-20">
          Legislative Change
         </p>
         <p class="type-meta-label">
          Initiative
         </p>
        </a>
       </li>
       <li class="flex-grid-col w-full xs:w-1/2 md:w-1/3">
        <a class="block text-current" href="https://www.hrc.org/resources/coming-out-living-authentically-as-transgender-or-non-binary">
         <img alt="" class="mb-32" src="https://hrc.imgix.net/files/images/resources/TransgenderInclusion-1600x900.png?auto=format%2Ccompress&amp;crop=focalpoint&amp;fit=crop&amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;h=211.2&amp;ixlib=php-2.1.1&amp;w=352&amp;s=1b3a7d86cca753555af5d797cb117478" srcset="https://hrc.imgix.net/files/images/resources/TransgenderInclusion-1600x900.png?auto=format%2Ccompress&amp;crop=focalpoint&amp;fit=crop&amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;h=211.2&amp;ixlib=php-2.1.1&amp;w=352&amp;s=1b3a7d86cca753555af5d797cb117478 352w" width="352"/>
         <p class="heading-24 mb-20">
          Trans Justice
         </p>
         <p class="type-meta-label">
          Resources
         </p>
        </a>
       </li>
       <li class="flex-grid-col w-full xs:w-1/2 md:w-1/3">
        <a class="block text-current" href="https://www.hrc.org/campaigns/my-body">
         <img alt="" class="mb-32" src="https://hrc.imgix.net/My-Body-sex-resource-500x281.jpg.jpg?auto=format%2Ccompress&amp;crop=focalpoint&amp;fit=crop&amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;h=211.2&amp;ixlib=php-2.1.1&amp;w=352&amp;s=22c7996eba28999caec8e7fb07d2dbf0" srcset="https://hrc.imgix.net/My-Body-sex-resource-500x281.jpg.jpg?auto=format%2Ccompress&amp;crop=focalpoint&amp;fit=crop&amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;h=211.2&amp;ixlib=php-2.1.1&amp;w=352&amp;s=22c7996eba28999caec8e7fb07d2dbf0 352w" width="352"/>
         <p class="heading-24 mb-20">
          Health Equity
         </p>
         <p class="type-meta-label">
          Initiative
         </p>
        </a>
       </li>
      </ul>
     </div>
    </section>
    <section class="section bg-white">
     <div class="wrapper -sm -padded text-center pb-112">
      <h2 class="heading-48 mb-24">
       Your voice has never been more important
      </h2>
      <p class="leading-snug text-16 md:leading-normal md:text-20">
       Join us on the right side of history. We represent a force of over 3 million members and supporters, brought together by our passion to realize a truly equal society. Our strength reflects each individual’s personal commitment to helping the LGBTQ community in the ways they can, from marching to donating to voting.
      </p>
     </div>
    </section>
    <section class="homepage-get-involved bg-blue-400 pt-0 text-white">
     <div class="wrapper -padded -lg">
      <div class="md:flex">
       <div class="text-center w-full md:-ml-48 md:w-1/2">
        <img alt="" class="-mt-112" src="https://hrc.imgix.net/InYourArea-homepage.jpg?auto=format%2Ccompress&amp;crop=focalpoint&amp;fit=crop&amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;h=771&amp;ixlib=php-2.1.1&amp;w=771&amp;s=6e3e16d06c4598be7814ebe9528325a9" srcset="https://hrc.imgix.net/InYourArea-homepage.jpg?auto=format%2Ccompress&amp;crop=focalpoint&amp;fit=crop&amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;h=771&amp;ixlib=php-2.1.1&amp;w=771&amp;s=6e3e16d06c4598be7814ebe9528325a9 771w" width="771"/>

          See what's happening near you
         </h3>

        <path d="M326.873 150.103H362.494V81.5375C362.494 76.3899 362.082 57.4468 362.082 57.4468H362.494C362.494 57.4468 370.524 73.3013 372.995 77.2135L416.235 150.103H452.885V2.88263H417.264V72.6836C417.264 77.8312 417.676 95.5388 417.676 95.5388H417.264C417.264 95.5388 409.44 80.9197 407.175 76.8017L363.524 2.88263H326.873V150.103Z">
        </path>
        <path d="M553.62 150.103H590.065V33.768H633.304V2.88263H510.792V33.768H553.62V150.103Z">
        </path>
        <path d="M653.052 150.103H689.497V88.744H741.178V150.103H777.623V2.88263H741.178V58.6823H689.497V2.88263H653.052V150.103Z">
        </path>
        <path d="M804.004 150.103H916.839V119.218H840.449V87.7145H904.896V59.3H840.449V32.9444H915.603V2.88263H804.004V150.103Z">
        </path>
       </svg>
      </span>
     </div>
    </section>
    <section class="section homepage-donate bg-yellow-500 relative z-1 print:px-24 print:border" data-animate="" data-label="partial-cta">
     <div data-animate-target="">
      <div class="wrapper -lg -padded relative z-2">
       <div class="text-theme-text-default-gray-900 md-d:text-center md:py-32 md:w-3/4 lg:w-1/2">
        <h2 class="heading-48">
         Donate to HRC
        </h2>
        <p class="mt-24">
         Make your contribution today and join a grassroots force of 3 million members and supporters committed to lesbian, gay, bisexual, transgender and queer equality.
        </p>
        <div class="mt-24">
         <a class="btn md-d:block -magenta" data-track-gtm="Tracking" href="https://give.hrc.org/page/47157/donate/">
          <span class="align-middle">
           Donate Now
          </span>
         </a>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </section>
    <section class="section">
     <div class="wrapper -lg -padded">
      <div class="flex justify-between mb-32">
       <h2 class="type-eyebrow">
        Recent News
       </h2>
       <a class="link-btn" href="/news">
        <span class="align-middle">
         View All
        </span>
        <span class="sr-only">
         News
        </span>
        <span class="icon rect-16">
         <svg aria-hidden="true" viewbox="0 0 16 17" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
          <path d="M9.66699 8.50065L10.3741 7.79354C10.5616 7.98108 10.667 8.23543 10.667 8.50065C10.667 8.76587 10.5616 9.02022 10.3741 9.20776L9.66699 8.50065ZM5.62655 5.87442C5.23603 5.4839 5.23603 4.85073 5.62655 4.46021C6.01708 4.06969 6.65024 4.06969 7.04077 4.46021L5.62655 5.87442ZM7.04077 12.5411C6.65024 12.9316 6.01708 12.9316 5.62655 12.5411C5.23603 12.1506 5.23603 11.5174 5.62655 11.1269L7.04077 12.5411ZM8.95989 9.20776L5.62655 5.87442L7.04077 4.46021L10.3741 7.79354L8.95989 9.20776ZM5.62655 11.1269L8.95989 7.79354L10.3741 9.20776L7.04077 12.5411L5.62655 11.1269Z">
          </path>
         </svg>
        </span>
       </a>
      </div>
      <div class="flex-grid">
       <div class="flex-grid-col w-full sm-d:border-b sm-d:border-gray-300 sm-d:mb-32 sm-d:pb-32 sm:w-1/2 md:w-3/5">
        <article aria-label="LGBTQ Equality is a Unifying Issue for Our Nation, Equality Act Reintroduced in Congress" class="relative" data-label="component-card">
         <img alt="" class="mb-24 w-full" src="https://hrc.imgix.net/Equality-Act-Image-shares-021821_Pass-the-Equality-Act-12X630.jpg?auto=format%2Ccompress&amp;crop=focalpoint&amp;fit=crop&amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;h=396&amp;ixlib=php-2.1.1&amp;w=660&amp;s=50f4788abdd901d476be8607cbf2ecd6" srcset="https://hrc.imgix.net/Equality-Act-Image-shares-021821_Pass-the-Equality-Act-12X630.jpg?auto=format%2Ccompress&amp;crop=focalpoint&amp;fit=crop&amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;h=396&amp;ixlib=php-2.1.1&amp;w=660&amp;s=50f4788abdd901d476be8607cbf2ecd6 660w" width="660"/>
         <p class="type-meta-label mb-8">
          February 18, 2021 | Viet Tran
         </p>
         <h3 class="block mb-8 heading-32">
          <a class="block text-current" href="https://www.hrc.org/news/lgbtq-equality-is-a-unifying-issue-for-our-nation-equality-act-reintroduced-in-congress">
           LGBTQ Equality is a Unifying Issue for Our Nation, Equality Act Reintroduced in Congress
           <span class="absolute inset-0">
           </span>
          </a>
         </h3>
         <p>
          Human Rights Campaign responded to the re-introduction of the Equality Act — federal legislation that would guarantee explicit, permanent protections for LGBTQ people under our nation's existing civil rights laws.…
         </p>
        </article>
       </div>
       <div class="flex-grid-col w-full sm:w-1/2 md:w-2/5">
        <div class="">
         <article aria-label="These are the States Trying to Stop Trans Kids from Playing Sports" class="relative" data-label="component-card">
          <p class="type-meta-label mb-8">
           February 10, 2021 | Ella Schneiberg
          </p>
          <h3 class="block mb-8 heading-24">
           <a class="block text-current" href="https://www.hrc.org/news/these-are-the-states-trying-to-stop-trans-kids-from-playing-sports">
            These are the States Trying to Stop Trans Kids from Playing Sports
            <span class="absolute inset-0">
            </span>
           </a>
          </h3>
         </article>
        </div>
        <div class="border-t border-gray-300 mt-32 pt-32">
         <article aria-label="Human Rights Campaign on Biden’s Reversal of the Ban on Transgender Military Service" class="relative" data-label="component-card">
          <p class="type-meta-label mb-8">
           January 25, 2021 | Viet Tran
          </p>
          <h3 class="block mb-8 heading-24">
           <a class="block text-current" href="https://www.hrc.org/press-releases/human-rights-campaign-on-bidens-reversal-of-the-ban-on-transgender-military-service">
            Human Rights Campaign on Biden’s Reversal of the Ban on Transgender Military Service
            <span class="absolute inset-0">
            </span>
           </a>
          </h3>
         </article>
        </div>
        <div class="border-t border-gray-300 mt-32 pt-32">
         <article aria-label="President Biden Issues Most Substantive, Wide-Ranging LGBTQ Executive Order In U.S. History" class="relative" data-label="component-card">
          <p class="type-meta-label mb-8">
           January 20, 2021 | Lucas Acosta
          </p>
          <h3 class="block mb-8 heading-24">
           <a class="block text-current" href="https://www.hrc.org/press-releases/president-biden-issues-most-substantive-wide-ranging-lgbtq-executive-order-in-u-s-history">
            President Biden Issues Most Substantive, Wide-Ranging LGBTQ Executive Order In U.S. History
            <span class="absolute inset-0">
            </span>
           </a>
          </h3>
         </article>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </section>
    <section class="section bg-white">
     <div class="wrapper -lg">
      <div class="bg-blue-100 py-32 px-24 md:p-48">
       <article aria-label="A New Day for Equality" class="relative" data-label="component-card-row">
        <div class="flex-grid mb-0">
         <div class="flex-grid-col sm:pb-0 w-full sm:w-1/4">
          <img alt="" class="border border-gray-200 w-full" src="https://hrc.imgix.net/Magazine-cover-rev.jpg?auto=format%2Ccompress&amp;crop=focalpoint&amp;fit=crop&amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;h=300&amp;ixlib=php-2.1.1&amp;w=225&amp;s=9d7d1556586a1b5bdad826c9eed6b5dd" srcset="https://hrc.imgix.net/Magazine-cover-rev.jpg?auto=format%2Ccompress&amp;crop=focalpoint&amp;fit=crop&amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;h=300&amp;ixlib=php-2.1.1&amp;w=225&amp;s=9d7d1556586a1b5bdad826c9eed6b5dd 225w, https://hrc.imgix.net/Magazine-cover-rev.jpg?auto=format%2Ccompress&amp;crop=focalpoint&amp;fit=crop&amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;h=600&amp;ixlib=php-2.1.1&amp;w=450&amp;s=360c43f415465f205925f46df4879902 450w" width="450"/>
         </div>
         <div class="flex-grid-col flex flex-col justify-center xs-d:justify-start pb-0 lg:pr-96 w-full sm:w-3/4">
          <p class="type-meta-label mb-8">
           Equality Magazine: Winter 2021
          </p>
          <h3 class="block heading-32">
           <a class="block text-current" href="https://www.hrc.org/magazine">
            <span class="align-middle">
             A New Day for Equality
            </span>
            <span class="absolute inset-0">
            </span>
           </a>
          </h3>
          <p class="mt-16">
           It is a new day in America. After an inspiring election, the White House and Congress are pro-equality and we are closer than ever before to achieving full equality under the law. But we can’t slow down as we cross the finish line, we must take action to realize our dreams and dismantle the systems of oppression. It is time to demand equality.
          </p>
          <p class="mt-16">
           <span class="font-bold text-14 text-theme-link-default-blue-400">
            Read the Winter 2021 issue
            <span class="icon rect-16">
             <svg aria-hidden="true" viewbox="0 0 16 17" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
              <path d="M9.66699 8.50065L10.3741 7.79354C10.5616 7.98108 10.667 8.23543 10.667 8.50065C10.667 8.76587 10.5616 9.02022 10.3741 9.20776L9.66699 8.50065ZM5.62655 5.87442C5.23603 5.4839 5.23603 4.85073 5.62655 4.46021C6.01708 4.06969 6.65024 4.06969 7.04077 4.46021L5.62655 5.87442ZM7.04077 12.5411C6.65024 12.9316 6.01708 12.9316 5.62655 12.5411C5.23603 12.1506 5.23603 11.5174 5.62655 11.1269L7.04077 12.5411ZM8.95989 9.20776L5.62655 5.87442L7.04077 4.46021L10.3741 7.79354L8.95989 9.20776ZM5.62655 11.1269L8.95989 7.79354L10.3741 9.20776L7.04077 12.5411L5.62655 11.1269Z">
              </path>
             </svg>
            </span>
           </span>
          </p>
         </div>
        </div>
       </article>
      </div>
     </div>
    </section>
    <section class="bg-blue-400 text-white">
     <div class="wrapper">
      <div class="flex lg-d:flex-wrap">
       <div class="flex flex-wrap items-center w-full sm:w-2/3">
        <div class="w-full px-24 py-20 md:px-80 lg:w-2/3">
         <h2 class="heading-32 mb-32 sm-d:text-center">
          Wear your heart on your shirt
         </h2>
         <div class="flex mb-24 sm:hidden">
          <div class="w-1/2">
           <img alt="Small hearts, black woman standing" class="block w-full" src="https://hrc.imgix.net/Sweatshirt.jpg?auto=format%2Ccompress&amp;crop=focalpoint&amp;fit=crop&amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;h=1000&amp;ixlib=php-2.1.1&amp;w=500&amp;s=13848448e65505494da17a04d1af3666" srcset="https://hrc.imgix.net/Sweatshirt.jpg?auto=format%2Ccompress&amp;crop=focalpoint&amp;fit=crop&amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;h=1000&amp;ixlib=php-2.1.1&amp;w=500&amp;s=13848448e65505494da17a04d1af3666 500w" width="500"/>
          </div>
          <div class="w-1/2">
           <img alt="" class="block w-full" src="https://hrc.imgix.net/MCMP_Rainbow_Mug-1.jpg?auto=format%2Ccompress&amp;crop=focalpoint&amp;fit=crop&amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;h=500&amp;ixlib=php-2.1.1&amp;w=500&amp;s=771ba1e938277f7be87dc37a66110e19" srcset="https://hrc.imgix.net/MCMP_Rainbow_Mug-1.jpg?auto=format%2Ccompress&amp;crop=focalpoint&amp;fit=crop&amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;h=500&amp;ixlib=php-2.1.1&amp;w=500&amp;s=771ba1e938277f7be87dc37a66110e19 500w" width="500"/>

    <section class="section bg-blue-100">
     <div class="wrapper -lg -padded">

       <div class="flex-grid-col w-full sm:w-1/2 lg:w-2/3">
        <h2 class="heading-20 mb-8">
         Our Sponsors
        </h2>
        <p class="mb-24">
         These companies have demonstrated a high level of commitment to equality. Please consider supporting those that support us.
        </p>
        <a class="link-btn" href="/about/corporate-partners">

         </span>

        <div class="mt-16">
         <button aria-controls="sponsors-list" class="flex justify-center items-center w-full" data-control="" type="button">
          <span data-pause="">
           <span class="icon rect-14 mr-4">
            <svg aria-hidden="true" fill="none" viewbox="0 0 14 15" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
             <path clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 0.453125C3.13401 0.453125 0 3.58713 0 7.45312C0 11.3191 3.13401 14.4531 7 14.4531C10.866 14.4531 14 11.3191 14 7.45312C14 3.58713 10.866 0.453125 7 0.453125ZM5.83333 4.82812C5.83333 4.66704 5.70275 4.53646 5.54167 4.53646H4.375C4.21392 4.53646 4.08333 4.66704 4.08333 4.82812V10.0781C4.08333 10.2392 4.21392 10.3698 4.375 10.3698H5.54167C5.70275 10.3698 5.83333 10.2392 5.83333 10.0781V4.82812ZM9.91667 4.82812C9.91667 4.66704 9.78608 4.53646 9.625 4.53646H8.45833C8.29725 4.53646 8.16667 4.66704 8.16667 4.82812V10.0781C8.16667 10.2392 8.29725 10.3698 8.45833 10.3698H9.625C9.78608 10.3698 9.91667 10.2392 9.91667 10.0781V4.82812Z" fill-rule="evenodd">
             </path>
            </svg>
           </span>
           <span class="text-12">
            Pause
           </span>
          </span>
          <span class="hidden" data-play="">
           <span class="icon rect-14 mr-4">
            <svg aria-hidden="true" fill="none" viewbox="0 0 73 73" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
             <path d="M36.2003 0.400159C16.3003 0.400159 0.200293 16.5002 0.200293 36.4002C0.200293 56.3002 16.3003 72.4002 36.2003 72.4002C56.1003 72.4002 72.2003 56.3002 72.2003 36.4002C72.2003 16.5002 56.1003 0.400159 36.2003 0.400159ZM25.6002 54.1001V18.0001L55.2003 36.1001L25.6002 54.1001Z">
             </path>
            </svg>
           </span>
           <span class="text-12">
            Play
           </span>
          </span>
         </button>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
      <div id="end-sponsors">
       <a class="skip-link" href="#start-sponsors">
        Skip to top of Sponsors
       </a>
      </div>
     </div>
    </section>
   </main>

         You are leaving HRC.org
        </h2>
        <div class="rich-text mb-32">
         <p>
